title: Turmoil (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Ever wanted to try your luck as a rich, successful oil entrepreneur? Now’s your chance! This week Turmoil is free on the Epic Games Store! Turmoil is a fun oil tycoon game about drilling for oil, making deals, and outsmarting your rivals. Go grab it while it’s free!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library
